The Palms Hotel & Spa
8.4 Excellent
Based on 1 reviews

Catalina Hotel and Beach Club
7.1 Very good
Based on 68 reviews

The room was clean & tidy. Pricing was good as well. Just that the light is too "romantic" that you can hardly see clear image, like putting on make-up.

We didn't face any problem during checkout but after returning to our country, we realise we have been overcharged. Reason bringing we booked thru website & didn't notice that actually the pricing doesn't include Taxes etc. But after minusing off the taxes etc, there is still extra cost. After a long period of laising with the website agent and the hotel, we are finally being refunded of the extra cost as there is some mistake by the hotel staff.

Show more
JUNE , Singapore
Riviera South Beach Hotel
7.9 Very good
Based on 45 reviews

The stay was fine. I was actually impressed because a lot of times, the online pictures are deceiving.

The room & hotel was very nice & very up to date as far as decor & comfortability. My only issue is that there were bed bugs. Everyday that i woke up, I had small bites around my ankles and wrist which had me scratching like a crazy person for hours. Also, 2 guys from maintenance came to check our TV because a few channels did not work & the sound kept going out. 1 guy really seemed like he did not know what he was talking about. Nobody offered to even reset the TV or any type of solution. So we were stuck with a faulty TV for 3 days. I work for Hyatt Place hotel & the protocol to solve any issues is completely different. We atleast offer some type of solution or if we cannot fix the problem, we offer the guest something to compensate for the inconvenience. We were not offered anything or any type of solution. This issue with sound happens every blue moon at our hotel, and if it does we just reset the TV & it fixes the problem. They just blamed the connection. Didn't even touch the TV. Other than that the stay we fine. I've been back home since Saturday & i am still itching from the bed bug bites, but other than that all is well.

Show more
Brittany , United States
Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour
9.4 Exceptional
Based on 7 reviews

Fashionhaus Hotel
7.2 Very good
Based on 68 reviews

I chose this hotel because it was one of the most cheap in South beach area. The hotel is small and was looking pretty new inside.

The room is OK, but I did not feel too comfortable there because of "fashion style" design, I actually prefer home style for sleeping. Another confusing thing in a first day was a loud music in a corridor just behind the room door. That assumed a fashion style, butbI did not enjoy that. Overall the hotel is situated in a very nice location, close to the beach, parking garages, travel /excursion agency , restaraunts and some brand shops. I believe young couples will like this hotel, it's more enterntainment style than home style. The hotel staff was performing bad for me, one spanish-speaking guy at receiption was obviously ignorant and always busy for his own affairs, not serving his customers right. he lost my booking where I extended the stay for 1 more day, and then threy issued a key for other guests who opened our room when we were there. not very nice. those guests then were denied to accomodate, cause the hotel was full. I also wouldn't recommend to use their valet parking. it took about 40 minutes to get our car back, despite their clames of 15 mins, and my car was dirty at the front. Fortunately there are many garages very close, and they are even cheaper than hotel's service. Overall the hotel is not too bad, just don't use their additional services.

Show more
Alexander , Russia
Hotel Croydon
9 Excellent
Based on 11 reviews

Vintro Hotel Miami Beach - Curio Collection by Hilton
9.7 Exceptional
Based on 7 reviews

Whitelaw Hotel
7 Very good
Based on 18 reviews

Grand Beach Hotel Surfside
8.2 Excellent
Based on 5 reviews

Chesterfield Hotel and Suites
7.5 Very good
Based on 32 reviews

I arrived there around 4pm on a Friday afternoon. Checked in and gave my keys to the valet. I went downtown using a taxi so I did not have to find a parking spot.

Came home went to bed early as I had to leave early the next morning. I got up around 7:30am and called for the valet to bring my car up. I received a call from the front desk a few minutes later asking me if I was sure I valet parked? I laughed and said, yeh right... Of course I am sure. So they couldn't find my car but it turns out that my car was still sitting where I had left it in front of the hotel. It never moved and they had no clue... To make matters worse they couldn't find the keys. What a comedy of errors at 8am on a Saturday in South Beach. To make matters worse, because the car was there all night I had a $47.00 ticket on the car!!! Well they finally found my keys in the valet stand which was pad-locked and had to be jimmied to get it open... LMAO now but not funny at the time. This is not a joke..this really happened.

Show more
Joseph , United States
Best Western Atlantic Beach Resort
6.4 Good
Based on 28 reviews

The hotel is in a great location, the pool sucks it's small looks like a kiddie pool, the rugs were disgusting the room have no storage in the bathroom no counters the towels are the worst quality you can think, we got there at night the sheets and blankets smelled like pee, they charge $32 per day for parking but the garage only have so many spots and its small like you won't believe so don't plan to park a SUV or mini van there, I saw a guy smash his mini van trying to park on their stupid small parking spots, the hotel looks like someone is working on renovate the rooms but it's like staying on a construction site, the balcony had a tall step between the slider door and the balcony so we kept hitting that and hurting our feet so don't plan to stay with kids it's not safe .

I would not stay there again and I won't recommend either. A bad hotel could ruin your stay..

Show more
Luzia , United States
Best Western On The Bay Inn and Marina
7.6 Very good
Based on 2 reviews

Hotel Shelley
7.7 Very good
Based on 31 reviews

Pros: The location is perfect! 1 block from the beach and 1 block from public parking garage (the cheapest one round there), many restaurants nearby.

We stayed there for 7 nights. We didn't care much that breakfast doesn't include in the room rate. You can just walk towards the beach then you'll definitely find some nice place to sit. Open bar from 7-8pm every night which you can get some cocktail and get chilled before going out for dinner or clubs. Front desk staffs are very helpful and friendly in every shift. Cons: We didn't have a good experience with housekeeping service here. After 1st night, we went out all day and came back to the room and found the bill from mini bar for the things I didn't eat!!? The price was not a lot (around USD 5 ) but why do I have to pay for the things I didn't even touch??? So we went down to the front desk guy, he checked on computer and said "don't worry, I'll take care of it". Also, there're some inconsistencies with the housekeeping service. Some days we didn't get a bathroom rug, some days we did. No face towel on some days also. If I'm being very picky, I would say that another disadvantage of the hotel is that they don't have an elevator. But I think that most hotels round there also don't have an elevator cause they're old buildings.

Show more
Onsiri , Thailand
Ocean Spray Hotel
7.5 Very good
Based on 39 reviews

very friendly check in staff when we got there. small hotel with a very old elevator and no amenities but if you are looking for a cheap and decent room to crash it is a good deal.

check out time was 11 which was a bit to early for my taste but you could have extended if you would have paid extra. proximity to the public beach but the more happening parts of sobe (e.g. lincoln road) are to far away to walk away but just a 10 usd cab away. you can easily get a cab in front of the hotel on the road all day (and night) long.

Show more

W South Beach
8.5 Excellent
Based on 5 reviews

Room Mate Waldorf Towers Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 10 reviews

Hotel Chelsea
7.4 Very good
Based on 30 reviews

I have read many negative comments on Chelsea but I am fortunate that I did not experience them. I love their stylish design and the rooms are probably suitable for couples but not family.

Chelsea is in great location. Also thumbs up to their "Happy Hour" everynight from 7-8pm and Lyn who was mending the bar counter was real friendly and great and prepares good mohito. Although I read many comments that it is pretty noisy with loud musics but I have not hear them. Perhaps we are on 2nd Flr and also feeling tired from our daily holiday activities Negative point was that there are no coffee provided in room especially if you are a coffee drinker and need them in the morning while waiting for your kid to get ready.

Holiday Inn Miami Beach-Oceanfront

The staff were really friendly, and I found the hotel in general great for a weekend break when I transited Miami for a weekend between two gruelling assignments in nearby countries.

My only complaint would be the apparent lack of room service - just a menu for a nearby pizza delivery company was provided. Seems odd; perhaps someone forgot to leave a menu in my room.

Anglers Miami South Beach - A Kimpton Hotel

South Seas Hotel
6.5 Good
Based on 4 reviews

Deauville Beach Resort
6.3 Good
Based on 145 reviews

the location is great, as long as you don't mind taking a bus ride to south beach if that's your thing.

there's a walgreens right across the street, perfect for picking up snacks and drinks to stock your fridge with. a bus stop is also right there on 67th st for your convenience. lots of great restaurant choices all within walking distance. you're right on the beach, but most the water rental activities (wave runners) are located on south beach. our oceanview room had very dirty windows and only face perpendicular to the beach. still better than facing the street. closed shops and empty restaurants downstairs, poor renovations, bland colors, and mediocre service all make this hotel now a shell of its former, prestigious 4-star beach resort. when we checked in, they advised us there would be an additional $15 charge added to our stay for us to use their beach chairs and room lock safe!! they made it seem mandatory, but then after talking to the other staff, i was told its optional, and i was able to get them to reverse the charge. but i felt like i was being taken advantage of. also, we were appalled that we could not have the hotel locate a microwave anywhere on the premise to re-heat our wonderful italian leftovers from the previous night and we ended up throwing them away. it seemed as though another ploy to force guests to pay extra for their food and services. we only needed to stay for one night (before our cruise departed) and because of this i believe i would still stay here at the deauville. but if you are staying for anymore than a couple days or expecting 4-star amenities and service, look elsewhere.

Lincoln Arms Suites
8.6 Excellent
Based on 42 reviews

We had a very good experience at the Licoln Arms. The location is close to Ocean Drive and Lincoln Mall, yet in a quiet side street with hardly any traffic.

The interior design is very cool. The reception desk is made of an airplane wing and the chairs in the reception are also made of air plane parts. The studios are very spacey and well designed with all amenities one might need. Missing for a perfect score are a pool (you can use the pool of their other hotel nearby) and a parking (they do have Valet parking service).

More about Miami Beach (FL)

Agoda.com features accommodation options from all over town. From high end international chain hotels to family run guesthouses, demands of all travelers are met. Whether traveling for business or leisure, Miami Beach (FL) is an outstanding city to visit with over 1270 hotels to choose from. LinkPoints Programme Qatar Airways Privilege Club reward-U Royal Skies Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer SkyPearl Club SM Advantage/ BDO Rewards Thai Airways Royal Orchid Plus The 1 Card Thailand TudoAzul United MileagePlus Velocity Frequent Flyer WAON POINT Featured Hotels Hotel Resort Guest House Apartment Villa The Palms Hotel & Spa 8.4 Excellent Based on 1 reviews Catalina Hotel and Beach Club 7.1 Very good Based on 68 reviews The room was clean & tidy. Pricing was good as well. Just that the light is too "romantic" that you can hardly see clear image, like putting on make-up. We didn't face any problem during checkout but after returning to our country, we realise we have been overcharged. Reason bringing we booked thru website & didn't notice that actually the pricing doesn't include Taxes etc. But after minusing off the taxes etc, there is still extra cost. After a long period of laising with the website agent and the hotel, we are finally being refunded of the extra cost as there is some mistake by the hotel staff. Show more JUNE , Singapore Riviera South Beach Hotel 7.9 Very good Based on 45 reviews The stay was fine. I was actually impressed because a lot of times, the online pictures are deceiving. The room & hotel was very nice & very up to date as far as decor & comfortability. My only issue is that there were bed bugs. Everyday that i woke up, I had small bites around my ankles and wrist which had me scratching like a crazy person for hours. Also, 2 guys from maintenance came to check our TV because a few channels did not work & the sound kept going out. 1 guy really seemed like he did not know what he was talking about. Nobody offered to even reset the TV or any type of solution. So we were stuck with a faulty TV for 3 days. I work for Hyatt Place hotel & the protocol to solve any issues is completely different. We atleast offer some type of solution or if we cannot fix the problem, we offer the guest something to compensate for the inconvenience. We were not offered anything or any type of solution. This issue with sound happens every blue moon at our hotel, and if it does we just reset the TV & it fixes the problem. They just blamed the connection. Didn't even touch the TV. Other than that the stay we fine. I've been back home since Saturday & i am still itching from the bed bug bites, but other than that all is well. Show more Brittany , United States Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour 9.4 Exceptional Based on 7 reviews Fashionhaus Hotel 7.2 Very good Based on 68 reviews I chose this hotel because it was one of the most cheap in South beach area. The hotel is small and was looking pretty new inside. The room is OK, but I did not feel too comfortable there because of "fashion style" design, I actually prefer home style for sleeping. Another confusing thing in a first day was a loud music in a corridor just behind the room door. That assumed a fashion style, butbI did not enjoy that. Overall the hotel is situated in a very nice location, close to the beach, parking garages, travel /excursion agency , restaraunts and some brand shops. I believe young couples will like this hotel, it's more enterntainment style than home style. The hotel staff was performing bad for me, one spanish-speaking guy at receiption was obviously ignorant and always busy for his own affairs, not serving his customers right. he lost my booking where I extended the stay for 1 more day, and then threy issued a key for other guests who opened our room when we were there. not very nice. those guests then were denied to accomodate, cause the hotel was full. I also wouldn't recommend to use their valet parking. it took about 40 minutes to get our car back, despite their clames of 15 mins, and my car was dirty at the front. Fortunately there are many garages very close, and they are even cheaper than hotel's service. Overall the hotel is not too bad, just don't use their additional services. Show more Alexander , Russia Hotel Croydon 9 Excellent Based on 11 reviews Vintro Hotel Miami Beach - Curio Collection by Hilton 9.7 Exceptional Based on 7 reviews Whitelaw Hotel 7 Very good Based on 18 reviews Grand Beach Hotel Surfside 8.2 Excellent Based on 5 reviews Chesterfield Hotel and Suites 7.5 Very good Based on 32 reviews I arrived there around 4pm on a Friday afternoon. Checked in and gave my keys to the valet. I went downtown using a taxi so I did not have to find a parking spot. Came home went to bed early as I had to leave early the next morning. I got up around 7:30am and called for the valet to bring my car up. I received a call from the front desk a few minutes later asking me if I was sure I valet parked? I laughed and said, yeh right... Of course I am sure. So they couldn't find my car but it turns out that my car was still sitting where I had left it in front of the hotel. It never moved and they had no clue... To make matters worse they couldn't find the keys. What a comedy of errors at 8am on a Saturday in South Beach. To make matters worse, because the car was there all night I had a $47.00 ticket on the car!!! Well they finally found my keys in the valet stand which was pad-locked and had to be jimmied to get it open... LMAO now but not funny at the time. This is not a joke..this really happened. Show more Joseph , United States Best Western Atlantic Beach Resort 6.4 Good Based on 28 reviews The hotel is in a great location, the pool sucks it's small looks like a kiddie pool, the rugs were disgusting the room have no storage in the bathroom no counters the towels are the worst quality you can think, we got there at night the sheets and blankets smelled like pee, they charge $32 per day for parking but the garage only have so many spots and its small like you won't believe so don't plan to park a SUV or mini van there, I saw a guy smash his mini van trying to park on their stupid small parking spots, the hotel looks like someone is working on renovate the rooms but it's like staying on a construction site, the balcony had a tall step between the slider door and the balcony so we kept hitting that and hurting our feet so don't plan to stay with kids it's not safe . I would not stay there again and I won't recommend either. A bad hotel could ruin your stay.. Show more Luzia , United States Best Western On The Bay Inn and Marina 7.6 Very good Based on 2 reviews Hotel Shelley 7.7 Very good Based on 31 reviews Pros: The location is perfect! 1 block from the beach and 1 block from public parking garage (the cheapest one round there), many restaurants nearby. We stayed there for 7 nights. We didn't care much that breakfast doesn't include in the room rate. You can just walk towards the beach then you'll definitely find some nice place to sit. Open bar from 7-8pm every night which you can get some cocktail and get chilled before going out for dinner or clubs. Front desk staffs are very helpful and friendly in every shift. Cons: We didn't have a good experience with housekeeping service here. After 1st night, we went out all day and came back to the room and found the bill from mini bar for the things I didn't eat!!? The price was not a lot (around USD 5 ) but why do I have to pay for the things I didn't even touch??? So we went down to the front desk guy, he checked on computer and said "don't worry, I'll take care of it". Also, there're some inconsistencies with the housekeeping service. Some days we didn't get a bathroom rug, some days we did. No face towel on some days also. If I'm being very picky, I would say that another disadvantage of the hotel is that they don't have an elevator. But I think that most hotels round there also don't have an elevator cause they're old buildings. Show more Onsiri , Thailand Ocean Spray Hotel 7.5 Very good Based on 39 reviews very friendly check in staff when we got there. small hotel with a very old elevator and no amenities but if you are looking for a cheap and decent room to crash it is a good deal. check out time was 11 which was a bit to early for my taste but you could have extended if you would have paid extra. proximity to the public beach but the more happening parts of sobe (e.g. lincoln road) are to far away to walk away but just a 10 usd cab away. you can easily get a cab in front of the hotel on the road all day (and night) long. Show more Philipp , Germany W South Beach 8.5 Excellent Based on 5 reviews Room Mate Waldorf Towers Hotel 8.7 Excellent Based on 10 reviews Hotel Chelsea 7.4 Very good Based on 30 reviews I have read many negative comments on Chelsea but I am fortunate that I did not experience them. I love their stylish design and the rooms are probably suitable for couples but not family. Chelsea is in great location. Also thumbs up to their "Happy Hour" everynight from 7-8pm and Lyn who was mending the bar counter was real friendly and great and prepares good mohito. Although I read many comments that it is pretty noisy with loud musics but I have not hear them. Perhaps we are on 2nd Flr and also feeling tired from our daily holiday activities Negative point was that there are no coffee provided in room especially if you are a coffee drinker and need them in the morning while waiting for your kid to get ready. Show more Liew , Malaysia 1 Hotel South Beach 9.6 Exceptional Based on 5 reviews The Confidante Miami Beach - In the Unbound Collection by Hyatt 8.4 Excellent Based on 2 reviews COMO Metropolitan Miami Beach 8.4 Excellent Based on 3 reviews Royal Palm South Beach Miami a Tribute Portfolio Resort 7.6 Very good Based on 3 reviews The Sagamore Hotel 7 Very good Based on 4 reviews Lexington Hotel - Miami Beach 5.3 Review score Based on 5 reviews Hilton Garden Inn Miami South Beach 9.2 Exceptional Based on 3 reviews Z Ocean Hotel South Beach 8.3 Excellent Based on 14 reviews The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton 7.4 Very good Based on 2 reviews Crystal Beach Suites Hotel 7.2 Very good Based on 11 reviews Holiday Inn Miami Beach-Oceanfront 7.4 Very good Based on 49 reviews The staff were really friendly, and I found the hotel in general great for a weekend break when I transited Miami for a weekend between two gruelling assignments in nearby countries. My only complaint would be the apparent lack of room service - just a menu for a nearby pizza delivery company was provided. Seems odd; perhaps someone forgot to leave a menu in my room. Show more Robin , United Kingdom Best Western Atlantic Beach Resort 6.4 Good Based on 28 reviews The hotel is in a great location, the pool sucks it's small looks like a kiddie pool, the rugs were disgusting the room have no storage in the bathroom no counters the towels are the worst quality you can think, we got there at night the sheets and blankets smelled like pee, they charge $32 per day for parking but the garage only have so many spots and its small like you won't believe so don't plan to park a SUV or mini van there, I saw a guy smash his mini van trying to park on their stupid small parking spots, the hotel looks like someone is working on renovate the rooms but it's like staying on a construction site, the balcony had a tall step between the slider door and the balcony so we kept hitting that and hurting our feet so don't plan to stay with kids it's not safe . I would not stay there again and I won't recommend either. A bad hotel could ruin your stay.. Show more Luzia , United States Four Points by Sheraton Miami Beach 6.8 Good Based on 11 reviews Loews Miami Beach Hotel 8.8 Excellent Based on 15 reviews Shelborne Wyndham Grand South Beach 7.9 Very good Based on 2 reviews Nobu Hotel Miami Beach 8.4 Excellent Based on 46 reviews Trump International Beach Resort 8.2 Excellent Based on 11 reviews Eden Roc Miami Beach 5.2 Review score Based on 3 reviews Anglers Miami South Beach - A Kimpton Hotel 9 Excellent Based on 3 reviews South Seas Hotel 6.5 Good Based on 4 reviews Deauville Beach Resort 6.3 Good Based on 145 reviews the location is great, as long as you don't mind taking a bus ride to south beach if that's your thing. there's a walgreens right across the street, perfect for picking up snacks and drinks to stock your fridge with. a bus stop is also right there on 67th st for your convenience. lots of great restaurant choices all within walking distance. you're right on the beach, but most the water rental activities (wave runners) are located on south beach. our oceanview room had very dirty windows and only face perpendicular to the beach. still better than facing the street. closed shops and empty restaurants downstairs, poor renovations, bland colors, and mediocre service all make this hotel now a shell of its former, prestigious 4-star beach resort. when we checked in, they advised us there would be an additional $15 charge added to our stay for us to use their beach chairs and room lock safe!! they made it seem mandatory, but then after talking to the other staff, i was told its optional, and i was able to get them to reverse the charge. but i felt like i was being taken advantage of. also, we were appalled that we could not have the hotel locate a microwave anywhere on the premise to re-heat our wonderful italian leftovers from the previous night and we ended up throwing them away. it seemed as though another ploy to force guests to pay extra for their food and services. we only needed to stay for one night (before our cruise departed) and because of this i believe i would still stay here at the deauville. but if you are staying for anymore than a couple days or expecting 4-star amenities and service, look elsewhere. Show more David , United States Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa Miami Beach North 8.7 Excellent Based on 1 reviews The Setai, Miami Beach 9.2 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Westgate South Beach Oceanfront Resort 9.2 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Golden Strand Resort 7.4 Very good Based on 170 reviews Royal Palm South Beach Miami, a Tribute Portfolio Resort 8 Very good Based on 1 reviews Acqualina Resort and Spa 9.3 Exceptional Based on 90 reviews MIAMI BEACH HOUSE 1 BED ROOM LUXURY ON THE BAY 6.3 Good Based on 2 reviews Bars B&B South Beach Hotel 9.1 Exceptional Based on 689 reviews Miami Beach Design Boutique House 8.5 Excellent Based on 4 reviews Villa Coconuts 10 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Tradewinds Apartment and Hotel 7.7 Very good Based on 24 reviews Lincoln Arms Suites 8.6 Excellent Based on 42 reviews We had a very good experience at the Licoln Arms. The location is close to Ocean Drive and Lincoln Mall, yet in a quiet side street with hardly any traffic. The interior design is very cool. The reception desk is made of an airplane wing and the chairs in the reception are also made of air plane parts. The studios are very spacey and well designed with all amenities one might need. Missing for a perfect score are a pool (you can use the pool of their other hotel nearby) and a parking (they do have Valet parking service). title: Miami Beach (FL) Hotels, United States: Great savings and real reviews
